Question: Formovie (Chongqing) Innovative Technology Co Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Formovie (Chongqing) Innovative Technology Co Ltd.

Product 1: Formovie V10
 - 240Hz ultra-high refresh rate
 - 12ms low latency
 - 4K UHD resolution
 - 2500 ANSI lumens brightness
 - Up to 200’’ screen size
 - Portable with FengOS
 - 2.1 track sound system with two 7.5W speakers and one 15W subwoofer

Product 2: Formovie V1 Ultra
 - First LCD Panel 4K projector

Product 3: Formovie S5 Rolling
 - (No specific features provided)

Product 4: Formovie X5
 - (No specific features provided)

General Features:
 - ALPD® laser display technology
 - Partnership with Denon for professional sound system
 - Intelligent automation with FengOS
 - Multiple design and innovation
